item.description: Wondering how to finance your real estate investments? No money down? Conventional financing? Hard money? Private money? With so many different options, it's hard to figure out when to use each method and what the differences are. Join us on February 1st for our monthly education and networking event, Turning the Key, where our Finance Panel will share with you the various ways you can - and cannot - finance your investments!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: ForeclosuresMass' Turning the Key: Finance Panel
